newsitem.title: USA: Green Tree Financial expands service center.
newsitem.headline: Green Tree Financial expands service center.

text.p: Green Tree Financial Corp said Thursday it plans to expand significantly its western service center in Rapid City, S.D.

The proposed expansion, in the form of a two-story addition, would add approximately 32,000 square feet to the existing 105,000 square foot facility. Upon completion, which is scheduled for the spring of 1997, the western service center will be able to accommodate up to 1,000 full-time and part-time employees.
